questions.question: This is the core maintainer of the Linux operating system
Rumours that he could launch nuclear missiles by whistling into the phone caused this man to be left in solitary confinement for 8 months
John "Captain Crunch" Draper discovered that toy whistles from the Captain Crunch box blew this very important frequency
This man wrote - and shares his name with - the first (known) computer worm in history
This man helped the FBI capture Kevin Mitnick
